RatePopup.text:
Do you like DaKanji?
If that is the case a rating would be awesome and it would help this project alot!

tutorial.undo_text: Press to undo the last stroke
tutorial.predictions_text: The predicted characters will be shown here
tutorial.short_press_prediction_text: A short press copies the prediction
tutorial.long_press_prediction_text: A long press opens the prediction in a dictionary
tutorial.multi_search_text: Here you can search multiple characters at once
tutorial.double_tap_prediction_text: A Double Tap adds the character to the search box
tutorial.multi_search_short_press_text: A short press copies the characters to the clipboard
tutorial.multi_search_long_press_text: A long press opens the characters in a dictionary
tutorial.multi_search_double_tap_text: A double tap empties the field
tutorial.multi_search_swipe_left_text: Swiping left on this field deletes the last character
tutorial.dictionary_settings_text: In the settings the translation service can be chosen

SettingsScreen.use_default_browser_for_online_dictionar: Use OS's default browser for online dictionaries
SettingsScreen.title: Settings
